name: Anonymous Coin
description: The cryptocurrency $ANON on the Solana blockchain is linked to the Anonymous collective, a decentralized international activist and hacktivist group. The purpose of the $ANON token is to support the activities of Anonymous, with a specific dedication to Kirtaner, who is noted as the founder of Anonymous. The token’s fees are directed to Kirtaner, with a mechanism utilizing the BAGS launchpad to fund or honor their contributions to the collective’s efforts.
